publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2977# Dr Elaine Murray: 50 Years of Chapelcross—That the Parliament notes that it is 50 years since the plans for the construction of Chapelcross power station in Annan were lodged; notes also that over its 45 years of power generation it produced enough electricity to power all homes in Dumfries and Galloway for 200 years and contributed an estimated £18 million per annum to the local economy; congratulates the workforce, past and present, for the safe operation of the power station, and looks forward to future developments on the Chapelcross site.

S2M-2977 # Dr Elaine Murray: 50 Years of Chapelcross—That the Parliament notes that it is 50 years since the plans for the construction of Chapelcross power station in Annan were lodged; notes also that over its 45 years of power generation it produced enough electricity to power all homes in Dumfries and Galloway for 200 years and contributed an estimated £18 million per annum to the local economy; congratulates the workforce, past and present, for the safe operation of the power station, and looks forward to future developments on the Chapelcross site.
S2M-2977 #50 Years of Chapelcross (lodged on 16 June 2005) Michael McMahon*
S2M-2977# 50 Years of Chapelcross (lodged on 16 June 2005) Murray Tosh*
S2M-2977# 50 Years of Chapelcross (lodged on 16 June 2005) Mary Scanlon*
